website_summaries.verdict: Great for couples just starting out or for families looking for affordable, everyday dishes.
pros: Comes in more colors and patterns if you want to spend a few extra dollars
cons: On the more expensive side if you get the larger set

customer_reviews.title: Quality Not As Good As Before
customer_reviews.text: I feel so bad writing this review because I grew up on Corelle Dinnerware Set and when we bought our own house, decided to use these as our everyday set since they're literally unbreakable, look fine, and are such a practical choice. We've been using this set less than two months ago, but they feel like a cheaper quality than I remember. When I try to stack the larger plates, they don't exactly fit and look warped, see picture. Not sure If I just got a bad set since I don't remember them being like this before.
customer_reviews.author: vanimea

customer_reviews.title: I will call never use anything except Corelle now!
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are truly amazing. I love everthing about them. I made the switch because of neck and back issues and my old dishes were just too heavy. I wish I made the change sooner!! Everthing came in perfect shape in the box, and after a quick run thru the dishwasher they were sparkling and ready!!!! We have been using them for about 1 week now and even mg husband is impressed. The Lids fit great also. I'm so loving these dishes!!! Can't wait for a dinner party to use a fully matching set!!! I feel like even our food tastes better cause everthing looks so pretty on them!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Broken Dish during Shipment
customer_reviews.text: The set is really nice and lightweight. We have an issue where one of the 6.25in Dessert Plates broke in the box during shipment. We have 12 of everything else, but only 11 of the Dessert plates. I was surprised to find that there was no wrapping around the plates or any other bubble wrap within the packaging. I think it's silly to return the whole set for one plate, so I'm hoping they'll send a replacement one instead.
customer_reviews.author: The Fagliers

customer_reviews.title: it goes with everything and can be easily enhanced with other pieces
customer_reviews.text: Having recently committed to simplification and ease while still maintaining a touch of elegance, this purchase met all our requirements. As others have mentioned, it goes with everything and can be easily enhanced with other pieces. It is light to carry, practical to use (indoor/outdoor) and storage is a space-saving dream. And that is without considering that the entire set cost what I could have paid for only two replacement pieces of my discontinued pattern; now relegated to "accents" here and there, if that! Highly recommend it. It's a game-changer.
customer_reviews.author: Afortunada.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the set
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the set. Lightweight and sturdy. Doesn’t make a loud noise when putting away. The lids are functional and convenient. The different size bowls and plates are great also. The only downside, is our first set arrived in a slightly damaged box and broken. We contacted Amazon and they sent a replacement and it was perfectly fine!
customer_reviews.author: Derick Brouhard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter-in-law. Very nice at a great price, but 3 of the pieces (although the box was packed very well) were unfortunately broken. Her young son has a penchant for breaking things accidentally, so I hope these will be durable; knew Correlle had a good reputation, but with 3 coming already broken, I am a bit worried.
customer_reviews.author: CrisS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the pieces that are included in this set. I gave it three stars because I believe some pieces are factory seconds. The underside of some of the pieces are not smooth but contain ridges. I’ve used Corelle for years and this is not my first set of winter frost. You don’t notice the defects until you’ve handled and washed each independent piece. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: nevr2l8

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful every day wear
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why, but found one broken dish in a stack of clean plates one day while setting the table (maybe cooled too fast from unloading in dishwasher?). But I have dropped other dishes and not had a chip or crack or break. These are beautiful! So clean and crisp looking. Love all the sizes, too. Sad one broke, but will likely replace it and stick with Corelle Livingware. Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great dish set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. It is so versatile with all the different pieces & lids!!! I had Corelle almost 40 years ago, then switched to a prettier stoneware. What a mistake!! So many of them chipped & they ended up looking awful! Just know that the bowls that come with this set are rather small. I have since added to this set with the pasta bowls & snack set.
customer_reviews.author: P. Malinowski

customer_reviews.title: Corelle is the best for families
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked me to get them for her husband. So I did. I would not have known that they got them unless I asked. He didn't like them because he is normal and doesn't care about things like dishes. I know that Corelle is a good product because I used them when my kids were younger. I bought white because that is a very popular color right now, that goes with almost everything. I need to quit shopping for other people.
customer_reviews.author: AgateAnne

customer_reviews.title: Good for clumsy adults and children
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we have 6 kids and 4 adults in the house. One adult has nerve damage and is always dropping stuff. These hit the floor and don't break into 50 pieces for me to clean up! They come out clean from the dishwasher and lighter on the cupboards. The stoneware weighs a ton. Oh yes, the toddlers likes to drop things off the highchair and they don't break. So much easier on me and the bare foot kids.
customer_reviews.author: K White

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I love corelle products and I specifically wanted to buy this one for our new home since I saw my mom using this and it’s been great product. Nothing is wrong with the product at all, but the only reason I’m giving it a four star because there were two items, the smallest plate and the desert bowl arrived broken. Unfortunately because of the way it was handled during the shipping process, now I don’t have a complete set for 12 servings. Bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: A great value!
customer_reviews.text: My mom wanted a new set of white Corelle to replace her original set she received as a wedding gift (30+ years old). This is the way to go if you want more than 4 place settings. Much better value than buying multiple sets of 4 place settings. She loves that she can use these daily but also use them during the holidays. They are packaged well and everything arrived intact.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn89

customer_reviews.title: Largest Set Available
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the largest sets available. It may be somewhat expensive, but look at the number of pieces you get. You won't find this large set in regular stores...many of them only carry sets of 20!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chip's picks

customer_reviews.title: But aside of that the quality and lightweight dinnerware is nice after all the stoneware
customer_reviews.text: I was so sick of having plates and bowls from 5 different dinner sets so I finally just bought this massive set from a trusted company. It was odd though to have slightly misshapen bowls and plates when stacked together. But aside of that the quality and lightweight dinnerware is nice after all the stoneware.
customer_reviews.author: Impact9

customer_reviews.title: Corelle is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really need service for 12 but I couldn't find any other set that had what I wanted, which was the varied bowl and plate sizes and no cups. I'm just going to give other people the extra sets until I have service for 4 or 6. Hopefully they will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: DameEdna

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver!  Clean, crisp white.
customer_reviews.text: Love these dishes! My dishes used to take up this entire cabinet, now only the bottom two shelves are used for this set (some of the dishes are currently in the dishwasher but all 72 pieces fit in the two shelves). I love the simplicity of the white. I do need to spot clean with baking soda now and then to remove stains. So nice to have a matching set with no chips!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Corelle Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are exactly what I expected. I have a set of Corelle that is 40 years old. I chose this plain white set so I could mix and match if necessary. I love the fact that it has to sizes of serving bowls, and lids for the smaller bowls and some lids for 6 soup/cereal bowls. The dessert bowls are a good size. Overall this set is perfect for daily use, but just as easily goes to work when entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: L. Powell

customer_reviews.title: I do not know why everyone doesn't have corelle
customer_reviews.text: I sold my old set so I could get these. They fit perfectly in the microwave, they stack tightly for storage, they fit great in the dishwasher, they are basic white and match everything, what else could you ask for. And they are made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Pylarinos

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Its super safe to be washed in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Its super safe to be washed in the dish washing machine. My mom dropped a plate in the kitchen on the hard wood floor and it didn't break, still in one great piece. Worth of every penny! I am able to use the same set of plates and bowls on the dinning table with my 3 and 5 year old boys. My aunt bought a few sets from Corelle when her son was 3 years old, and she is still using it. Btw her son is now 34 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Tan

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to go back to white Corelle dishes that will ...
customer_reviews.text: After years of using heavy stoneware dishes that cracked and chipped, I am happy to go back to white Corelle dishes that will go with any kitchen color or decor, is light weight, and practically unbreakable. This will be the last set of dishes I will ever buy!
customer_reviews.author: Donna K.

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS BUNDLE
customer_reviews.text: Best dinnerware set I have ever purchase. You can't go wrong with Corelle brand products. So worth the money and probably the best deal I have come across from high quality dinnerware set.
customer_reviews.author: Kong

customer_reviews.title: Light, durable and a classic look.
customer_reviews.text: I love these dishes. They are super light, strong and durable. My young children have no problem rinsing and loading their own plates and I’m not worried about them braking them. I don’t like serving my kids on plastic so these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A really great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: A really great value for the price. I love that there are lids for the serving bowls. No need to transfer food into a tupperware afterwards, just pop the lid on. Made it through the dishwasher just fine.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Full set, has everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced our entire wedding-gift set of Corelle which served us for 30 years as our everyday set of dishes. This stuff is great. Oh and be sure to order lids for the bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.

customer_reviews.title: Really like these dishes!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set of dishes. They are lightweight and easily handled. Although plain white they look nice with any color tablecloth or placemat. The set of twelve in so many sizes is just great for whatever is being served. You won't be disappointed if you get this set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I purchased this set from a 2nd hand store
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not what I expected from Corelle. I feel like I purchased this set from a 2nd hand store. The bottoms on all but 12of the 74 items are flawed with some type of marks that don't come off. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. These are lightweight and very easy to handle. I did receive 1 cereal bowl with a chip. I contacted the manufacturer and they sent a replacement within 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with these
customer_reviews.text: I love the great variety of dishes, bowls and serving platters included in the set. They’re durable, look nice and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: B Fox

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dinnerware set but lot of items are blemished
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with my first order of 18-Piece Corelle Winter Frost Dinnerware with it's lightweight, easy to clean and beautiful design. Therefore I decided to order a bigger set of 74 pieces. However, the second order come with many others has blemished in the bottom of the bows, included 5 midsize bowls, 2 small bowls and 2 big bowls. At first, i thought the blemishs are just because of dust but they are permanent actually, unable to remove. I think Corelle needs to pay more attention on their quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Love how the lids are available even for the bowls ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for having a set of corolla available minus the cups. I have other cups I prefer using for coffee and tea. Love how the lids are available even for the bowls and also serving pieces instead of cups that I would not use.
customer_reviews.author: B  Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! I would definitely recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: There are so crisp and clean looking. They do well in the dishwasher. Great quality! I would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan of Corelle
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd set of Corelle. Went to all white this time and put my old set in our RV. I'm a big fan of Corelle especially for every day dishes. They are so sturdy and can be used in the microwave. This set came with handy storage lids. I added more of the rimmed bowls to complete the set in a separate order.
customer_reviews.author: MorningGlory

customer_reviews.title: Timeless design.
customer_reviews.text: Corelle honors the warranty and replaces dishes that arrive broken. Excellent glassware. Fits in dishwasher well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Steadmoore Kellerson III

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, we love this set! It is super sturdy. My fiance dropped one of the small plates on the ground and it just bounced around, no chip, nothing. Good alternative compared to super expensive plates!
customer_reviews.author: Andumbrokhani

customer_reviews.title: Love corelle
customer_reviews.text: Love this set and so glad we got this when we did. Great price! Can’t find it anymore especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Hsien Jung

customer_reviews.title: and load in the dishwasher much better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace some stoneware dishes. These save lots of space in the cabinets, and load in the dishwasher much better.
customer_reviews.author: Just your average guy

customer_reviews.title: Big set takes little room on shelves
customer_reviews.text: Love them light weight wash great,look good on a table and don’t take a lot of room
customer_reviews.author: Etteglad

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with some of the warping in the plates.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice Corelle dinnerware set for the money, no frills. Alas, one of the larger dinner plates was pretty severely warped in its shaping and I don't know how to go about getting it replaced without having to send the ENTIRE 74-pc set back to Amazon. That seems like overkill to me.
customer_reviews.author: Eleni15

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: Job well done Corelle. Thank you for putting thought into the packaging. No damage at all. The pieces are thinner and lighter than I anticipated. Yet sturdy and appealing. Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Dishes EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best dishes i have ever purchased. Very strong, and most importantly they don't get hot in the microwave. No chips ever!!
customer_reviews.author: bagheri

customer_reviews.title: These dishes are great, and I recommend them
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are great, and I recommend them. The extra serving bowls, platters, and covers are great to have too! Packaging was good, but one of the cereal bowls arrived chipped several places around the rim. Hoping to get that replaced, but still happy with the purchase, and no complaints aside from that one broken bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Yet Simple
customer_reviews.text: Great set and a reasonable price. Just love the beating Corelle can take. This set is also very simple yet elegant. I purchased to reduce the amount of paper plates we were going thru when we have a large group we're entertaining. The set is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Bruning

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE Correlle!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this Correlle! Bought as a wedding gift for Son and Daughter in law. Wanted to start them off right!! This set is a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: The best dishes!
customer_reviews.text: Corelle is the best! Dropped on ceramic floor and didn't break, wow. Always loved them. This set is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mo

customer_reviews.title: Corelle is the way to go!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These hold up to children nice. They hold up to accidentally being dropped on the floor much better than other dishes. They aren't bulky or heavy so they don't take up as much space in the dishwasher or bow you cupboards from all the weight!! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dish set. Great quality, and the best part is I was able to very easily find additional pieces online to add to this set exactly which pieces I wanted more of.
customer_reviews.author: Tomberly

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with the set
customer_reviews.text: We knew we wanted corelle because they are light weight, take up minimal space compared to other dinnerware, and my parent's have had a similar set for over 20 years. We did have an 8-1/2 inch plate come with a chip on the side from shipping but after calling corelle they are sending a replacement so that was no big deal. We are very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set-well designed
customer_reviews.text: After 15 years of stoneware dishes that ckst a fortune and kept chipping—white corelle to the rescue! This set is perfection-you get everything you need!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Karsten

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Soup/cereal bowl seem oddly small. I like the lids and serving pieces. All the pieces are sturdy and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Great Assortment of Items
customer_reviews.text: These are light weight and easy to stack in the cabinets or the dishwasher. A great variety of sized plates and bowls. I love the plastic bowl covers to make it easy to go from dinner table to refrigerator for left overs. My mother had a set for over 30 years with 5 children and they were nearly indestructible. I hope this last similarly long.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy P.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Buyer
customer_reviews.text: No chips or breaks in any of the dishes! I grew up using these at my grandmother's house and had to have my own set. Hers have lasted over 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Muyres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted and it was all packaged well. I would definitely get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth King

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: Nathan's wife Review: I love this set. I check every single plate. Just one plate had some scratch on the back, but it is ok. I am very happy with my set.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweigh and they do not break!
customer_reviews.text: Dinnerware is great. Love that they are not heavy at all. Worth every penny! Purposely dropped on tile and laminated floors and did not break!! ..... just amazing. Don’t over think it.... buy them you will not regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: These dishes are light weight. They do not get ...
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are light weight. They do not get black marks when silverware touches it. The box came well packed so nothing was broken.
customer_reviews.author: ND customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity of Corelle and this basic white color. I really had wanted the square dishes, but that style didn't come in this all inclusive set. Nonethless, I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lady94

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the Corelle white dinnerware. What a great product and made in the USA too.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan & Stacy Brashier

customer_reviews.title: Can't replace  plate broken in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The dishes are fine, just what I wanted to give my Grand daughter. However, one of the plates was broken and I can't get a replacement without sending the whole , very heave set back!
customer_reviews.author: Celestial Traveler

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice set and fits well into a smaller cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice set and fits well into a smaller cabinet. Pretty lightweight also. It is very plain with no design of any kind, so it goes well with any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Corelle wins!
customer_reviews.text: I had corelle brand dishes growing up and nothing has changed as far as quality! First time using them, our dog knocked a plate off the table onto tile floor. It did not break, chip or crack! Corelle 1; Tile floor 0.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this set
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this set, I actually use the medium sized plates the most and I love the mini bowls! The serving platters and bowls also come in handy too!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ... second set we have needed to order -- look great & last a long timed
customer_reviews.text: over 47 years of marriage this is only the second set we have needed to order -- look great & last a long timed k
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SET!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set!! The lids that come with the bowls are more handy than I would’ve thought! Such a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Love Corelle products but be warned....this product is very heavy :)
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set, however I wish they included more than two of the medium sized bowls.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set, however I wish they included more than two of the medium sized bowls.
customer_reviews.author: wed4877

customer_reviews.title: Unsmashable!
customer_reviews.text: These have withstood my three kids under 10, so yes they’re really shatterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Kim T.

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Light and durable I was lookingfor simple and white. Great set for the price
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz G.

customer_reviews.title: easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, easy to store. Lids are very useful for leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McGarrett

customer_reviews.title: Large set of basic corelle. Durable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My grandma had a set of this while I was growing up. They last forever. My set arrived in great packaging, all intact. I love how big this set is! Great for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N. Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very happy with product light, small size, easy to wash
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set. I love the white. It looks so clean and simple, and is easy to add more dishes.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Plate chipped
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package, one of the smallest sized plates had a chip.it is very sharp and thus cannot be used. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! No regrets purchasing this! A lot cheaper than the store too.
customer_reviews.author: d_lapan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! I love being able to serve and store in the same bowl. The bowl sizes work well for our family and make putting the dishes away so easy since they're not thick and heavy. Wish I had bought these dishes years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but one of the plates were chipped
customer_reviews.text: Good value, but one of the plates were chipped, and the plates seemed thinner than our previous set. The bowls are also a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gentner

customer_reviews.title: Corning reputation makes them great
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to clean by hand or in dishwasher. The dish covers were a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: G. burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. Came very well packaged: nothing was broken. Whiter than I expected but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicole Warren

customer_reviews.title: I really like Corelle Dinnerware, but my set had a broken piece enclosed. This was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really like Corelle Dinnerware. As stated by other reviewers, my set did not come with all the items intact. Otherwise, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and durable
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to run the dishwasher every day with this many dinnerware. It's so thin and doesn't take too much space in my cabinet either. Just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi S.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have wrist and strength issues - Corelle has created the best product to not let that hinder every meal. Love this set!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Neiwert

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived early than I expected. I love my new set!!! perfectly wrapped and no broken plates... Can’t wait to used it... thankssss 😊
customer_reviews.author: Remaylen Antolin

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable, easy to clean. Go for it if you need some basic plates.
customer_reviews.author: KMcWebb

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I am accident prone with my dishes ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I am accident prone with my dishes and also have a young child, so I wanted a simple, cheap set. I have dropped 2 plates and 1 bowl on my hard wood floor since my purchase-they didn't even crack! I'm so happy. They are easy to clean. The plain, simplicity of the set really makes your food the centerpiece-which as a person that works hard on our meals-I am happy about! I would purchase again or as a gift for a person just starting out. These are versatile enough to mix into any set. *No, I am not affiliated with the company in anyway. I'm just excited about these!
customer_reviews.author: A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Corelle Ware, looks great on the table.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's Corelle Ware. Nice looking, reasonable and a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love these dishes
customer_reviews.text: Love these dishes!!! My kids have already dropped them and no breaks or scratches🤗 Also liked that I could buy these without having to get a bunch of useless coffee mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It is a great set and I ordered the salad/pasta bowls to go ...
customer_reviews.text: This set was everything I wanted it to be. It is a great set and I ordered the salad/pasta bowls to go with them. Love it all. I have some corelle that I have had for 37 years. Still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Snaq

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, plenty of place settings for my 6 person ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, plenty of place settings for my 6 person household and the many guests that we have over. Classic white gives us the option to mix up the colors elsewhere on our table without having clashing colors or styles.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Great set and value for the price. I love that it includes serving pieces and lids for bowls. The white color is perfect. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sangria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: How do I get two plates the ahipped chipped. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the lids for the bowls--very useful
customer_reviews.text: Loving this set. Love the lids for the bowls--very useful. Perfect that there are no mugs. I didn't need them.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchgirl

customer_reviews.title: I'm really glad we went with his pick
customer_reviews.text: My bf wanted these but they reminded me of my grandma. I'm really glad we went with his pick. They go with everything, easy to clean, and very durable
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: 2 bread and butter plates broken. 2 dinner plates have a red sticky substance on them.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Gardner

customer_reviews.title: good delivered on time and the products were as mentioned on the promo

customer_reviews.title: Corelle for life.
customer_reviews.text: Great set! It's versatile and great for day to day or a dinner with friends. I would definalty recommend this set; it's a great price and quality.

product_meta.title: CORELLE Winter Frost White Dinnerware Set with Storage Lids 74-Piece, (Service for 12)
product_meta.description: CORELLE Winter Frost White Dinnerware Set with Storage Lids 74-Piece, (Service for 12)
feature_bullets: Serveware is also included: two (2) 12-1/4-inch platters, two (2) 1-quart serving bowls with lids, and two (2) 2-quart serving bowls. Included are two BPA-free storage lids each for the 1-quart serving bowls and 18-ounce cereal bowls
This set features simple and elegant all-white pieces, perfect for complementing your existing dinnerware
All pieces are made of Corelle triple-layer strong glass, which is break and chip resistant, lightweight, and easily stackable for space saving
Dishwasher safe, this non-porous and versatile dinnerware can be used in the microwave and oven

Serveware is also included: two (2) 12-1/4-inch platters, two (2) 1-quart serving bowls with lids, and two (2) 2-quart serving bowls. included are two BPA-free storage lids each for the 1-quart serving bowls and 18-ounce cereal bowls
